result.title: Changing CF handle in the first 3 days
result.content: I joined Codeforces with this account on Sept. 8, 2017. While creating the account, I think I saw something like "You can't change your handle after first 7 days". Again, I mention that I 'think' I saw this. Now that I want to change my handle, can I do it? If yes, how so? Thanks in advance :)
